Label.en: It’s a really well made helmet…
Label.fr: It’s a really well made helmet…
Label.es: It’s a really well made helmet…

Label.en: It offers great protection on all sides, and even has holes at the bottom of the nose for breathing!
Label.fr: It offers great protection on all sides, and even has holes at the bottom of the nose for breathing!
Label.es: It offers great protection on all sides, and even has holes at the bottom of the nose for breathing!

Label.en: So the user could breathe comfortably while being hit in the face with a sword or axe!
Label.fr: So the user could breathe comfortably while being hit in the face with a sword or axe!
Label.es: So the user could breathe comfortably while being hit in the face with a sword or axe!

Label.en: It’s incredibly intricate! It’s decorated all over with panels showing different scenes!
Label.fr: It’s incredibly intricate! It’s decorated all over with panels showing different scenes!
Label.es: It’s incredibly intricate! It’s decorated all over with panels showing different scenes!

Label.en: Not that much use in a battle!
Label.fr: Not that much use in a battle!
Label.es: Not that much use in a battle!

Label.en: But pretty to look at all the same!
Label.fr: But pretty to look at all the same!
Label.es: But pretty to look at all the same!

Label.en: The helmet is thought to have belonged to King Raedwald of East Anglia
Label.fr: The helmet is thought to have belonged to King Raedwald of East Anglia
Label.es: The helmet is thought to have belonged to King Raedwald of East Anglia
